General.Name: Index Living Mall Public Company Limited
General.Description: Index Living Mall Public Company Limited engages in the retail and wholesale of furniture, electronic, and home decorative products in Thailand. It operates through four segments: Retail of Furniture, Manufacturing of Furniture, Rental Area and Service, and Others. The company is also involved in the manufacture, import, export, and distribution of furniture and home appliances; and warehouse rental activities, as well as in the franchise business. The company was founded in 1973 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.
